div.div: 获取微信支付缓存KEY（订单号，产品编号，渠道编号，支付金额，商户编号，支付渠道编号，支付方式）

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe flex-start; width: 443px; height: 1px; padding-top: 286px; margin-left: 269px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
初始化构建统一下单入参：
1. 如果未传入支付流水号，则新建pbm_order_payment 记录，并作为本次支付的流水号，payState=0；
2. 当未传入交易起始时间，则默认当前时间；
3. 当未传入交易截止时间，则默认当前时间+120分钟；
4. 根据查询到的特药支付渠道初始化支付渠道，支付方法。

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1316px; margin-left: 636px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 11px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; background-color: #ffffff; white-space: nowrap;
display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 178px; height: 1px; padding-top: 1176px; margin-left: 547px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div: 查询同一个商户，订单号，产品编号（微信支付渠道）下是否存在未支付的起始时间距当前时间小于5分钟的订单

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: left;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
封装微信支付统一下单接口返回的参数并根据支付过期时间缓存微信支付
查询该商户号，订单号，产品编号，支付渠道编号，未支付（排除当前已经持久化的）支付订单，然后关闭这些订单；
关闭订单：
1. pbm_pay_order state=6
2. 调用微信关闭订单接口
3. 删除此支付订单的缓存

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 148px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2561px; margin-left: 657px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;
display: inline-block; font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: #000000; line-height: 1.2; pointer-events: all; white-space: normal; word-wrap: normal;

div.div:
取消已经构建的支付订单
pbm_pay_order state=4

div.style: display: flex; align-items: unsafe center; justify-content: unsafe center; width: 1px; height: 1px; padding-top: 2359px; margin-left: 731px;
box-sizing: border-box; font-size: 0; text-align: center;

div.div: 构建收银台支付订单对象（未持久化）
